panels.description: Skuteczność biznesowa per protokół/kanał. Służy do odróżnienia problemów produktowych od problemów integracyjnych.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  multiIf(
    notEmpty(dimensions['protocol']), dimensions['protocol'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['channel']), dimensions['channel'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['transport']), dimensions['transport'],
    'unknown'
  ) AS protocol,
  avg(businessSuccess) * 100 AS business_success_pct
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
GROUP BY time, protocol
ORDER BY time, protocol

panels.title: Business success by protocol/channel

panels.description: Rozkład statusów technicznych (2xx/4xx/5xx/other) w czasie. Pozwala odseparować problemy klienta od błędów systemowych.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  multiIf(
    processorStatus >= 200 AND processorStatus < 300, '2xx',
    processorStatus >= 400 AND processorStatus < 500, '4xx',
    processorStatus >= 500 AND processorStatus < 600, '5xx',
    'other'
  ) AS status_class,
  count() AS txns
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
GROUP BY time, status_class
ORDER BY time, status_class

panels.title: Processor status classes over time

panels.description: Mix operacji bankowych. Ułatwia wykrycie, że np. tylko reversal/topup przestały przechodzić.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toStartOfInterval(eventTime, INTERVAL $__interval_s SECOND) AS time,
  multiIf(
    notEmpty(dimensions['transaction_type']), dimensions['transaction_type'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['tx_type']), dimensions['tx_type'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['operation']), dimensions['operation'],
    'unknown'
  ) AS tx_type,
  count() AS txns
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
GROUP BY time, tx_type
ORDER BY time, tx_type

panels.title: Bank operation mix over time

panels.description: Tabela triage: które businessCode i segmenty mają najwięcej problemów jakościowych i najgorszy RTT.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  if(businessCode = '', 'n/a', businessCode) AS business_code,
  multiIf(
    notEmpty(dimensions['transaction_type']), dimensions['transaction_type'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['tx_type']), dimensions['tx_type'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['operation']), dimensions['operation'],
    'unknown'
  ) AS tx_type,
  multiIf(
    notEmpty(dimensions['protocol']), dimensions['protocol'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['channel']), dimensions['channel'],
    notEmpty(dimensions['transport']), dimensions['transport'],
    'unknown'
  ) AS protocol,
  count() AS txns,
  (1 - avg(businessSuccess)) * 100 AS fail_pct,
  quantileTDigest(0.95)(processorDurationMs) AS p95_rtt_ms,
  max(processorDurationMs) AS max_rtt_ms
FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventTime)
  AND match(swarmId, '${swarm:regex}')
  AND match(callId, '${callId:regex}')
GROUP BY business_code, tx_type, protocol
HAVING txns >= 20
ORDER BY fail_pct DESC, txns DESC
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Worst business segments (failure + RTT)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT swarmId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 ORDER BY swarmId
list.label: Swarm
list.name: swarm
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT swarmId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 ORDER BY swarmId

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT callId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE callId != '' ORDER BY callId LIMIT 500
list.label: Call ID
list.name: callId
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT callId FROM ph_tx_outcome_v1 WHERE callId != '' ORDER BY callId LIMIT 500
